name: Hyper Arm
description:
Controller is required for this game

Complete as many tasks as you can by grabbing items and performing their challenges. Drop the item into the bin to receive a point and get the next item. The game starts upon grabbing the stopwatch.

Controls:

Upper Arm - Left Thumb Stick

Forearm - Right Thumb Stick

Grab/Drop - Right Trigger

Use Held Item - Right Bumper (Only applies to certain items)

Tasks:

Bowling Ball: Throw the ball at all the pins. Item velocity is determined by the arm velocity when you drop it.

Gun: Shoot moving targets with the USE button

Boxing Glove: Hit the punching bag with the claw. Damage is determined by arm speed

Yarn: Connect the dots

Lightbulb: Guide the moth through all the zones. The moth will follow the lightbulb when on,  or maintain its current path when off

Magnet: Sort the nuts & bolts into their respective buckets. USE to pick up and drop objects

Pencil: Draw a line from one point to another without going outside the boundary
